saao/saa15/P313504
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-e-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU is-su-ri LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a ša LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} mi-i-nu ṭe₃-en-šu UD 11-KAM₂ ša {ITI}ŠU a-na {URU}E₂-bu-nak-ki e-ta-rab UD 13-KAM₂ it-tu-ṣi a-na KUR-u₂ e-te-li a-ki an-ni-i {LU₂}A-KIN-e-a {LU₂}A-KIN-e-a i-sap-ra ma-a {URU}bu-ra-a-te i-qab-bu-u₂-ni-šu {URU}HAL.ṢU-MEŠ-šu₂ ša i-qa-an-ni i-qa-an-ni E₂ {1}dal-ta-a ša LU₂ ma-a i-si-šu it-ta-ak-ra ma-a a-na ŠA₃-bi il-lak ma-a šum₂-ma u₂-sa-al-la-an-šu₂ ma-a šum₂-ma ina qar-a-bi u₂-še-ra-da-aš₂-šu₂-nu ma-a TA ŠA₃-bi a-na {KUR}il-li-pi ina UGU DUMU {1}dal-ta-a il-lak x x x x x gab-bu {LU₂}x x x x {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} x x x x it-ta-ab-bu x x x x ša LUGAL NIM.MA{KI} a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia a-x x x x x ša {URU}HAL.ṢU x x x x I₃ HUL-MEŠ x x x x x ina UGU x+x x x ša ina KAR ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni a-ki ša x+x x x x x x x gab-x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ša x x x x x x x ina UGU x+x x x x x ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni a-sap-ra u₂-bal-u₂-ni ina UGU {1}EN-x+x x x+x ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a {1}ba-la-su UN-MEŠ-šu₂ lu-sa-hi-ra lid-di-na-šu₂ {1}ba-la-su x x x x na-ṣa-aš₂-šu DI-mu a-na {URU}de-re EN.NUN-MEŠ DUG₃.GA UN-MEŠ dul-la-šu-nu e-pu-šu a-na-ku dul-lu ša {URU}HAL.ṢU e-pa-aš₂ ša₂-al-hi-i a-ra-ṣi-bi ša₂-a-ri ša a-na ŠA₃-bi {IM}U₁₈.LU ša a-na ŠA₃-bi {IM}KUR.RA up-ta-ṭi-ir ar₂-ti-ṣi-bi la u₂-ga-me-ri 50-a.a na-da-ba-ku an-ta-tah ša₂-a-ri ša {IM}SI.SA₂ ša {IM}MAR.TU an-nu-rig a-ra-ṣib a-na {1}ba-la-su LUGAL be-li₂ liš-al šu-u₂ dul-lu u₂-da
